This is Kara's first pass at wrangling the Spiritual Epidemiology data (with data from 2019-03-08). (Note: PDF printed portrait, 80% zoom, minimum margins.)

```{r global_options, include = F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width = 4, fig.asp = 0.67,
                      include = F, echo = F)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(langcog)
library(psych)
library(readxl)
library(cowplot)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(kableExtra)
library(lubridate)

theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
d_raw <- read_xlsx("../Spiritual Epidemiology_Coded Data.xlsx", sheet = 3)
```

```{r}
var_key <- read_xlsx("../Spiritual Epidemiology_Coded Data.xlsx", sheet = 4) %>%
  rename(question = VARIABLE,
         question_renamed = `NEW VARIBALES`,
         question_text = QUESTION,
         response_options = `RESPONSE OPTIONS`,
         coding = CODING) %>%
  mutate(question_text = gsub("‚Äô", "'", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("‚Äî", " - ", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("‚Äú", "'", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("‚Äù", "'", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("\n", " ", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("\r", " ", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("  ", " ", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("  ", " ", question_text),
         question_text = gsub("  ", " ", question_text)) %>%
  mutate(order = 1:nrow(.)) %>%
  select(order, question, question_text) %>%
  arrange(order)
```

```{r}
# check for duplicates
duplicates <- d_raw %>%
  count(epi_ctry, epi_subj) %>%
  filter(n > 1)

d00 <- full_join(
  d_raw %>% filter((!epi_subj %in% duplicates$epi_subj)),
  d_raw %>% filter(epi_subj %in% duplicates$epi_subj & 
                     epi_batc == "First")) %>%
  mutate(epi_ctry = factor(epi_ctry,
                           levels = c("US", "Ghana", "Thailand",
                                      "China", "Vanuatu")))

d00 %>%
  count(epi_ctry, epi_subj) %>%
  filter(n > 1)

d00 %>% 
  distinct(epi_ctry, epi_subj) %>%
  count(epi_ctry)
```

```{r}
d0_epi_1 <- d00 %>% 
  select(epi_batc:epi_subj, starts_with("epi_1_")) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(epi_1_01, epi_1_02, epi_1_03, epi_1_04, epi_1_05, epi_1_06,
                 epi_1_07, epi_1_08, epi_1_09, epi_1_10, epi_1_11, epi_1_12,
                 epi_1_13, epi_1_14, epi_1_15, epi_1_16),
            funs(num = as.numeric(.),
                 cat = recode_factor(.,
                                     "0" = "it does not happen",
                                     "0.5" = "it might happen",
                                     "1" = "it definitely happens"))) %>%
  select(-c(epi_1_01, epi_1_02, epi_1_03, epi_1_04, epi_1_05, epi_1_06,
            epi_1_07, epi_1_08, epi_1_09, epi_1_10, epi_1_11, epi_1_12,
            epi_1_13, epi_1_14, epi_1_15, epi_1_16)) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(epi_1_01a:epi_1_01c, epi_1_04a:epi_1_04c, 
                 epi_1_06a:epi_1_06c, epi_1_07a:epi_1_07c,
                 epi_1_11a:epi_1_11c, epi_1_14a:epi_1_14c),
            funs(num = as.numeric(.),
                 cat = recode_factor(.,
                                     "0" = "no",
                                     "1" = "a little",
                                     "2" = "a lot"))) %>%
  select(-c(epi_1_01a:epi_1_01c, epi_1_04a:epi_1_04c, 
            epi_1_06a:epi_1_06c, epi_1_07a:epi_1_07c,
            epi_1_11a:epi_1_11c, epi_1_14a:epi_1_14c)) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(epi_1_vut07a),
            funs(epi_1_vut07a_num = as.numeric(.),
                 epi_1_vut07a_cat = recode_factor(.,
                                                  "0" = "no",
                                                  "1" = "yes"))) %>%
  select(-c(epi_1_vut07a)) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(epi_1_chn16a:epi_1_chn16c),
            funs(num = as.numeric(.),
                 cat = recode_factor(.,
                                     "0" = "no",
                                     "0.5" = "maybe",
                                     "1" = "definitely"))) %>%
  select(-c(epi_1_chn16a:epi_1_chn16c)) # %>%

#                           TRUE ~ "base"),
#        qtype2 = case_when(grepl("_num", question) ~ "numeric",
#                           grepl("_cat", question) ~ "categorical"))
```

```{r}
d0_epi_demo <- d00 %>% 
  select(epi_batc:epi_subj, contains("_demo_")) %>%
  mutate(epi_demo_sex = factor(epi_demo_sex,
                               levels = c("Male", "Female", "Other")),
         epi_demo_age = gsub("~", "", epi_demo_age),
         epi_demo_age = gsub("Mid 40s", "45", epi_demo_age),
         epi_demo_age = as.numeric(epi_demo_age),
         epi_demo_edu = recode(
           epi_demo_edu,
           "Did not graduate HS" = "No HS degree",
           "High school" = "HS degree",
           "Vocational schooling (Politechnic school)" = "Vocational school",
           "Vocational schooling (Polytechnic school)" = "Vocational school",
           "Some college" = "Some college",
           "BA" = "Bachelors degree",
           "MA" = "Masters degree",
           "Graduate Degree (Ghana only)" = "Other graduate degree",
           "Non Specific Graduate Degree (only Ghana)" = "Other graduate degree",
           "PhD" = "Other graduate degree",
           "Other" = "Other"),
         epi_demo_edu = factor(epi_demo_edu,
                               levels = c("No HS degree", "HS degree",
                                          "Vocational school", "Some college",
                                          "Bachelors degree", "Masters degree",
                                          "Other graduate degree", "Other")),
         epi_demo_ubru = case_when(!is.na(epi_demo_ubru_1) ~ "Rural",
                                   !is.na(epi_demo_ubru_2) ~ "Urban"),
         epi_demo_ses_num = case_when(!is.na(epi_demo_ses_1) ~ -2,
                                      !is.na(epi_demo_ses_2) ~ -1,
                                      !is.na(epi_demo_ses_3) ~ 0,
                                      !is.na(epi_demo_ses_4) ~ 1,
                                      !is.na(epi_demo_ses_5) ~ 2),
         epi_demo_ses_cat = factor(epi_demo_ses_num,
                                   labels = c("much poorer", 
                                              "a little poorer", 
                                              "about the same", 
                                              "a little richer", 
                                              "much richer")),
         epi_demo_howr_cat = factor(tolower(epi_demo_howr),
                                    levels = c("strongly disagree", 
                                               "disagree", 
                                               "neither agree nor disagree", 
                                               "agree", 
                                               "strongly agree")),
         epi_demo_howr_num = as.numeric(epi_demo_howr_cat) - 3) %>%
  select(-c(epi_demo_ubru_1:epi_demo_ubru_3, epi_demo_ses_1:epi_demo_ses_6,
            epi_demo_howr)) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(epi_demo_affr, epi_demo_tung, epi_demo_ytng,
                 epi_demo_phn, epi_demo_email),
            funs(num = case_when(
              epi_demo_affr %in% c("1", "Yes", "yes", "Y", "y") ~ 1,
              epi_demo_affr %in% c("0", "No", "no", "N", "n") ~ 0))) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(epi_demo_affr_num, epi_demo_tung_num, epi_demo_ytng_num,
                 epi_demo_phn_num, epi_demo_email_num),
            funs(cat = factor(., levels = c("no", "yes")))) %>%
  rename_at(vars(ends_with("_num_cat")),
            funs(gsub("_num_cat", "_cat", .))) %>%
  select(-c(epi_demo_affr, epi_demo_tung, epi_demo_ytng,
            epi_demo_phn, epi_demo_email))
  # gather(question, response, -c(epi_batc, epi_ctry, epi_subj)) %>%
  # arrange(epi_ctry, epi_subj, epi_batc, question)
```

# Porosity

```{r}
d_por <- d0_epi_1 %>% 
  select(epi_ctry, epi_subj, ends_with("_num")) %>%
  gather(question, response, -c(epi_ctry, epi_subj)) %>%
  mutate(question = gsub("_num", "", question)) %>%
  left_join(var_key) %>%
  mutate(epi_ctry = factor(epi_ctry, levels = c("US", "Ghana", "Thailand", 
                                                "China", "Vanuatu")))
```

```{r}
d_por_scored <- d_por %>%
  filter(!grepl("a", question), !grepl("b", question), 
         !grepl("c", question)) %>%
  group_by(epi_ctry, epi_subj) %>%
  summarise(# score_mean = mean(response, na.rm = T),
            score = sum(response, na.rm = T)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(epi_ctry = factor(epi_ctry, levels = c("US", "Ghana", "Thailand", 
                                                "China", "Vanuatu")))
```

```{r}
write.csv(d_por, "data_wrangled/d_por.csv")
write.csv(d_por_scored, "data_wrangled/d_por_scored.csv")
```

                    "epi_2_vut14", "epi_2_thl12a", "epi_2_thl12b")
